attributes.action: Repair to school hall at St Catherine's School, Ware, Hertfordshire
attributes.additional_details:
We want the local authority to take responsibility to replace our school hall following a flood in the summer. For more details please read the attached link

http://wareonline.co.uk/discussion/viewtopic.php?f=35&t=60&sid=9db58139d853ea14983cb7a6d4d21720

Still nothing is being done and our children do not have use of a school hall.

Please sign this petition so that our children's voices can be heard.
